mn128:3.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn128:3.2: “idha, bhante, kosambiyaṃ bhikkhū bhaṇḍanajātā kalahajātā vivādāpannā aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā viharanti.
mn128:3.3: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
mn128:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
mn128:4.2: “alaṃ, bhikkhave, mā bhaṇḍanaṃ, mā kalahaṃ, mā viggahaṃ, mā vivādan”ti.
mn128:4.3: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn128:4.6: appossukko, bhante, bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyutto viharatu;
mn128:4.7: mayametena bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti.

mn128:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā ṭhitakova imā gāthā bhāsitvā yena bālakaloṇakāragāmo tenupasaṅkami.
mn128:7.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā bhagu bālakaloṇakāragāme viharati.
mn128:7.3: Addasā kho āyasmā bhagu bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
mn128:7.4: Disvāna āsanaṃ paññapesi udakañca pādānaṃ dhovanaṃ.
mn128:7.7: Āyasmāpi kho bhagu bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn128:7.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn128:7.9: “kacci, bhikkhu, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci piṇḍakena na kilamasī”ti?
mn128:7.10: “Khamanīyaṃ bhagavā, yāpanīyaṃ bhagavā, na cāhaṃ, bhante, piṇḍakena kilamāmī”ti.
mn128:7.11: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena pācīnavaṃsadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
mn128:8.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo pācīnavaṃsadāye viharanti.
mn128:8.2: Addasā kho dāyapālo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
mn128:9.1: Assosi kho āyasmā anuruddho dāyapālassa bhagavatā saddhiṃ mantayamānassa.
mn128:10.1: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho yenāyasmā ca nandiyo yenāyasmā ca kimilo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantañca nandiyaṃ āyasmantañca kimilaṃ etadavoca:
mn128:10.3: Atha kho āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo bhagavantaṃ paccuggantvā
mn128:10.4: eko bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi, eko āsanaṃ paññapesi, eko pādodakaṃ upaṭṭhapesi.
mn128:10.7: Tepi kho āyasmanto bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
mn128:10.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn128:10.9: “kacci vo, anuruddhā, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci piṇḍakena na kilamathā”ti?
mn128:10.10: “Khamanīyaṃ bhagavā, yāpanīyaṃ bhagavā, na ca mayaṃ, bhante, piṇḍakena kilamāmā”ti.
mn128:11.1: “Kacci pana vo, anuruddhā, samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṃ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharathā”ti?
mn128:11.2: “Taggha mayaṃ, bhante, samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṃ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharāmā”ti.
mn128:11.3: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tumhe, anuruddhā, samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṃ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharathā”ti?
mn128:12.4: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, imesu āyasmantesu mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ āvi ceva raho ca,
mn128:12.5: mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ āvi ceva raho ca,
mn128:12.6: mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ āvi ceva raho ca.
mn128:12.8: ‘yannūnāhaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā imesaṃyeva āyasmantānaṃ cittassa vasena vatteyyan’ti.
mn128:12.9: So kho ahaṃ, bhante, sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā imesaṃyeva āyasmantānaṃ cittassa vasena vattāmi.
mn128:12.10: Nānā hi kho no, bhante, kāyā, ekañca pana maññe cittan”ti.

mn128:13.2: Kacci pana vo, anuruddhā, appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathā”ti?
mn128:14.1: “Taggha mayaṃ, bhante, appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharāmā”ti.
mn128:14.2: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tumhe, anuruddhā, appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathā”ti?
mn128:14.3: “Idha, bhante, amhākaṃ yo paṭhamaṃ gāmato piṇḍāya paṭikkamati, so āsanāni paññapeti, pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, avakkārapātiṃ upaṭṭhāpeti.
mn128:14.4: Yo pacchā gāmato piṇḍāya paṭikkamati—sace hoti bhuttāvaseso, sace ākaṅkhati, bhuñjati; no ce ākaṅkhati, appaharite vā chaḍḍeti apāṇake vā udake opilāpeti—
mn128:14.5: so āsanāni paṭisāmeti, pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paṭisāmeti, avakkārapātiṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmeti, bhattaggaṃ sammajjati.
mn128:14.6: Yo passati pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā paribhojanīyaghaṭaṃ vā vaccaghaṭaṃ vā rittaṃ tucchaṃ so upaṭṭhāpeti.
mn128:14.7: Sacassa hoti avisayhaṃ, hatthavikārena dutiyaṃ āmantetvā hatthavilaṅghakena upaṭṭhāpema, na tveva mayaṃ, bhante, tappaccayā vācaṃ bhindāma.
mn128:14.8: Pañcāhikaṃ kho pana mayaṃ, bhante, sabbarattiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdāma.
mn128:14.9: Evaṃ kho mayaṃ, bhante, appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharāmā”ti.
mn128:15.2: Atthi pana vo, anuruddhā, evaṃ appamattānaṃ ātāpīnaṃ pahitattānaṃ viharataṃ uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti?

mn128:28.1: So kho ahaṃ, anuruddhā, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañhi kho sañjānāmi, na ca rūpāni passāmi;
mn128:28.2: rūpāni hi kho passāmi, na ca obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi:
mn128:28.5: ‘ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yvāhaṃ obhāsañhi kho sañjānāmi na ca rūpāni passāmi;
mn128:28.6: rūpāni hi kho passāmi na ca obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi—
mn128:28.7: kevalampi rattiṃ, kevalampi divaṃ, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:28.9: ‘yasmiñhi kho ahaṃ samaye rūpanimittaṃ amanasikaritvā obhāsanimittaṃ manasi karomi, obhāsañhi kho tasmiṃ samaye sañjānāmi, na ca rūpāni passāmi.
mn128:28.10: Yasmiṃ panāhaṃ samaye obhāsanimittaṃ amanasikaritvā rūpanimittaṃ manasi karomi, rūpāni hi kho tasmiṃ samaye passāmi na ca obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi—
mn128:28.11: kevalampi rattiṃ, kevalampi divaṃ, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:29.1: So kho ahaṃ, anuruddhā, appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto parittañceva obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi, parittāni ca rūpāni passāmi;
mn128:29.2: appamāṇañceva obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi, appamāṇāni ca rūpāni passāmi:
mn128:29.5: ‘ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yvāhaṃ parittañceva obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi, parittāni ca rūpāni passāmi;
mn128:29.6: appamāṇañceva obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi, appamāṇāni ca rūpāni passāmi—
mn128:29.7: kevalampi rattiṃ, kevalampi divaṃ, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:29.9: ‘yasmiṃ kho me samaye paritto samādhi hoti, parittaṃ me tasmiṃ samaye cakkhu hoti.
mn128:29.10: Sohaṃ parittena cakkhunā parittañceva obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi, parittāni ca rūpāni passāmi.
mn128:29.11: Yasmiṃ pana me samaye appamāṇo samādhi hoti, appamāṇaṃ me tasmiṃ samaye cakkhu hoti.
mn128:29.12: Sohaṃ appamāṇena cakkhunā appamāṇañceva obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi, appamāṇāni ca rūpāni passāmi—
mn128:29.13: kevalampi rattiṃ, kevalampi divaṃ, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:30.1: Yato kho me, anuruddhā, ‘vicikicchā cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.2: iti viditvā vicikicchā cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘amanasikāro cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.3: iti viditvā amanasikāro cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘thinamiddhaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.4: iti viditvā thinamiddhaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘chambhitattaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.5: iti viditvā chambhitattaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘uppilaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.6: iti viditvā uppilaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘duṭṭhullaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.7: iti viditvā duṭṭhullaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘accāraddhavīriyaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.8: iti viditvā accāraddhavīriyaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘atilīnavīriyaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.9: iti viditvā atilīnavīriyaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘abhijappā cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.10: iti viditvā abhijappā cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘nānattasaññā cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.11: iti viditvā nānattasaññā cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi, ‘atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso’ti—
mn128:30.12: iti viditvā atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ cittassa upakkileso pahīno ahosi.
mn128:31.2: ‘ye kho me cittassa upakkilesā te me pahīnā.
mn128:31.4: So kho ahaṃ, anuruddhā, savitakkampi savicāraṃ samādhiṃ bhāvesiṃ, avitakkampi vicāramattaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvesiṃ, avitakkampi avicāraṃ samādhiṃ bhāvesiṃ, sappītikampi samādhiṃ bhāvesiṃ, nippītikampi samādhiṃ bhāvesiṃ, sātasahagatampi samādhiṃ bhāvesiṃ, upekkhāsahagatampi samādhiṃ bhāvesiṃ.
mn128:32.1: Yato kho me, anuruddhā, savitakkopi savicāro samādhi bhāvito ahosi, avitakkopi vicāramatto samādhi bhāvito ahosi, avitakkopi avicāro samādhi bhāvito ahosi, sappītikopi samādhi bhāvito ahosi, nippītikopi samādhi bhāvito ahosi, sātasahagatopi samādhi bhāvito ahosi, upekkhāsahagatopi samādhi bhāvito ahosi.
mn128:32.3: akuppā me cetovimutti. Ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
mn128:32.5: Attamano āyasmā anuruddho bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
